biotools.summary: Curated and integrated biomarker knowledgebase for animals. BioKA houses 16296 biomarkers associated with 951 diseases/traits from a comprehensive compilation of 4747 literature references across 31 species, including 9 model animals, 16 domestic animals, 5 other animals and human.

bioschemas.name: BioKA
bioschemas.summary: Curated and integrated biomarker knowledgebase for animals. BioKA houses 16296 biomarkers associated with 951 diseases/traits from a comprehensive compilation of 4747 literature references across 31 species, including 9 model animals, 16 domestic animals, 5 other animals and human.
